description: A turbocharged all-wheel-drive sedan that doubles as a rally weapon. The Thunder Pulse puts power down with mechanical fury â€” the turbo hits like a freight train and the AWD system hooks up on any surface. Understated looks hide serious intent.
lore: Boreal built the Thunder Pulse for World Rally Championship homologation, and you can feel that pedigree in every corner. The boxer-layout turbo four sounds like an angry hornet's nest and the symmetrical AWD system is unflappable. The official car of showing up and shutting up.
